org.opentcs.access.rmi

类 DynamicRemoteKernelProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.access.rmi.DynamicRemoteKernelProxy
  • 已过时。 
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0")
public final class DynamicRemoteKernelProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates proxies that hide the details of communication with a remote kernel, so a client can call methods of the proxy as if it was a kernel instance within the same JVM.

    If the kernel you want to connect to is running on a host named "foobar", you usually only have to do the following: 

     Kernel kernel = DynamicRemoteKernelProxy.getProxy("foobar");

    You can then use kernel to call methods on the proxy, which will be wrapped by RMI calls internally and forwarded to the remote kernel you connected to. This interface to the kernel can e.g. be used to create transport orders from clients - see the developer's guide for code examples.

    The proxy will immediately start polling periodically for events with the remote kernel. You can use a custom event filter and custom intervals and timeouts for polling by calling one of the other getProxy() methods. Using an instance of AcceptingTCSEventFilter as its event filter (which is the default) will let the proxy receive every event generated inside the kernel without filtering out any of them. To receive all or some of these events in your client code, register an event listener with the proxy by calling its addEventListener() method. The proxy will then forward all events that it received and that are not filtered by your event filter to your registered listener.

      static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host)
      已过时。 
      Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host at the default RMI port, using a standard user name and password, an AcceptingTCSEventFilter, a poll interval of 1 ms and a poll timeout of 1000 ms.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getProxy

        public static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host,
                                   int port,
                                   java.lang.String userName,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   EventFilter<TCSEvent> eventFilter,
                                   long eventPollInterval,
                                   long eventPollTimeout)
                            throws KernelUnavailableException,
                                   CredentialsException
        已过时。 
        Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host and at the given port. After the proxy is created, it implicitly logs in with the remote kernel.
        参数:
        host - The host running the RMI registry.
        port - The TCP port at which the RMI registry should be listening.
        userName - The user name to use when logging in with the remote kernel.
        password - The password to use when logging in.
        eventFilter - An event filter for filtering events with the remote kernel.
        eventPollInterval - The time to wait between event polls with the remote kernel (in ms).
        eventPollTimeout - The time to wait for events to arrive when polling (in ms).
        返回:
        A proxy for the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        KernelUnavailableException - If the remote kernel is not reachable for some reason.
        CredentialsException - If the client login with the remote kernel failed, e.g. because of incorrect login data.
        另请参阅:
        RemoteKernel.pollEvents(ClientID, long)

      • getProxy

        public static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host,
                                   java.lang.String userName,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   EventFilter<TCSEvent> eventFilter,
                                   long eventPollInterval,
                                   long eventPollTimeout)
                            throws KernelUnavailableException,
                                   CredentialsException
        已过时。 
        Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host and at the default RMI port. After the proxy is created, it implicitly logs in with the remote kernel.
        参数:
        host - The host running the RMI registry.
        userName - The user name to use when logging in with the remote kernel.
        password - The password to use when logging in.
        eventFilter - An event filter for filtering events with the remote kernel.
        eventPollInterval - The time to wait between event polls with the remote kernel (in ms).
        eventPollTimeout - The time to wait for events to arrive when polling (in ms).
        返回:
        A proxy for the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        KernelUnavailableException - If the remote kernel is not reachable for some reason.
        CredentialsException - If the client login with the remote kernel failed, e.g. because of incorrect login data.
        另请参阅:
        RemoteKernel.pollEvents(ClientID, long)

      • getProxy

        public static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host,
                                   EventFilter<TCSEvent> eventFilter,
                                   long eventPollInterval,
                                   long eventPollTimeout)
                            throws KernelUnavailableException,
                                   CredentialsException
        已过时。 
        Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host at the default RMI port, using a standard user name and password. After the proxy is created, it implicitly logs in with the remote kernel.
        参数:
        host - The host running the RMI registry.
        eventFilter - An event filter for filtering events with the remote kernel.
        eventPollInterval - The time to wait between event polls with the remote kernel (in ms).
        eventPollTimeout - The time to wait for events to arrive when polling (in ms).
        返回:
        A proxy for the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        KernelUnavailableException - If the remote kernel is not reachable for some reason.
        CredentialsException - If the client login with the remote kernel failed, e.g. because the standard user name and password are not accepted.
        另请参阅:
        RemoteKernel.pollEvents(ClientID, long)

      • getProxy

        public static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host,
                                   EventFilter<TCSEvent> eventFilter)
        已过时。 
        Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host at the default RMI port, using a standard user name and password, a poll interval of 1 ms and a poll timeout of 1000 ms. After the proxy is created, it implicitly logs in with the remote kernel.
        参数:
        host - The host running the RMI registry.
        eventFilter - An event filter for filtering events with the remote kernel.
        返回:
        A proxy for the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        KernelUnavailableException - If the remote kernel is not reachable for some reason.
        CredentialsException - If the client login with the remote kernel failed, e.g. because the standard user name and password are not accepted.
        另请参阅:
        RemoteKernel.pollEvents(ClientID, long)

      • getProxy

        public static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host)
        已过时。 
        Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host at the default RMI port, using a standard user name and password, an AcceptingTCSEventFilter, a poll interval of 1 ms and a poll timeout of 1000 ms. After the proxy is created, it implicitly logs in with the remote kernel.
        参数:
        host - The host running the RMI registry.
        返回:
        A proxy for the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        KernelUnavailableException - If the remote kernel is not reachable for some reason.
        CredentialsException - If the client login with the remote kernel failed, e.g. because the standard user name and password are not accepted.
        另请参阅:
        RemoteKernel.pollEvents(ClientID, long)

      • getProxy

        public static KernelProxy getProxy(java.lang.String host,
                                   int port,
                                   EventFilter<TCSEvent> eventFilter)
        已过时。 
        Creates a proxy for a remote kernel registered with a RMI registry on the given host at the given RMI port, using a standard user name and password, a poll interval of 1 ms and a poll timeout of 1000 ms. After the proxy is created, it implicitly logs in with the remote kernel.
        参数:
        host - The host running the RMI registry.
        port - The TCP port at which the RMI registry should be listening.
        eventFilter - An event filter for filtering events with the remote kernel.
        返回:
        A proxy for the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        KernelUnavailableException - If the remote kernel is not reachable for some reason.
        CredentialsException - If the client login with the remote kernel failed, e.g. because the standard user name and password are not accepted.
        另请参阅:
        RemoteKernel.pollEvents(ClientID, long)
